Regal Crow Canyon Stadium 6.address: 2525 San Ramon Valley Blvd , San Ramon , CA 94583-1603
reviewComments: Clean and comfortable way to watch a movie ! The staff are all nice and the lobby and bathrooms are kept clean !

Canyon Lakes Golf Course & Brewery.address: 640 Bollinger Canyon Way , San Ramon , CA 94582-4971
reviewComments: This course is under-rated. It is well kept. And easy to get a Tee Time. The cafeteria is not so nice, but is under renovations. Well worth the money to play here.-
